views.markdown:
Added iOS 12.2 Support Added iOs 13.x Support Fixed: Activator Integration Fixed: Flipswitch Integration

Fixed: Sync the flipswitch and "enabled" toggle in settings.
Fixed: Potential freezes on respring/reboot.
Added: 2% more love.
Fix: iOS7 and below settings resetting after respring/reboot. (Sorry about the popup alert every time) iOS 9 Support + New: Activator Alert to show your real Battery Percent. Suggested by /u/HardNoob86
+ Update: Fake Battery Alert also toggles fake battery level on. Suggested by Ylli Ferizi

+ iOS 8 Support
+ Preference Pane Makeover
Fixed: No longer requires Flipswitches to be installed to instantly update battery level. (from preference pane)
Add "Confirm" Button in Settings to save Percentage Added Activator Gesture: Show a Fake Low Battery Alert
Added Settings Option: "Disable on Threshold". Shows the real battery level if it drops below 10%

Fixed a bug when deactivating, the Status bar battery would jump to 100% and then back to the correct level after a delay.
